repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is an artificial collection created for small University Archives collections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is a series of fifty-three letters between Sir Anthony Eden and David G. McGunegle, from January, 1967 to March, 1972. Anthony Eden, Lord Avon, assisted as David McGonegle wrote his Master's Thesis entitled, "In Search of Support: Anthony Eden and Anglo­American Policy, 1934-1938." The letters include hand written notes by Lord Avon. These letters date from 1966-1972. Robert Anthony Eden, 1st Earl of Avon, KG, MC, PC (12 June 1897 h Conservative politician who served three periods as Foreign Secretary and then a relatively brief term as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1955 to 1957.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: To the extent that she owns copyright, the donor has assigned the copyright in her works to The George Washington University; however, copyright in other items in this collection may be held by their respective creators. For activities that the researcher determines fall under fair use as defined under U. S. Copyright Law, no permission to cite or publish is required. Please contact Special Collections if the copyright status of the materials you wish to reuse is unclear. Staff will provide additional information. For re-use of materials in the collection not created by the donor, researchers are responsible for determining who may hold materials' copyrights, determining if the intended re-use falls under fair use, and obtaining approval from the copyright holder if the intended use does not fall under fair use. For such materials, researchers do not need anything further from The George Washington University's Special Collections Research Center. The donor has asked that David McGunegle receive appropriate credit should the letters be used in a publication.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: David McGunegle completed his GW Masters Thesis in history in 1966. The title is In search of support : Anthony Eden and Anglo-American policy, 1934-1938 Catalog record
